plot outline: The film takes us through a journey where one faces the consequence when two people meet each other. Devathai, who is the daughter of the ex minister Chitravel comes across her first love Kaushik. Meanwhile her elder sister Nithya develops a relationship with her fathers rival Paddi Alandhans son Prakash. A special investigating officer Nagaraj is set to unravel the clues and through his investigation, he gradually realizes that it is not a man, but demonic forces leading to gruesome murders.
